short_summary: Notice of Proposed Procurement Shared Services Canada (SSC) has a requirement for Encrypted external 8Tb SSD drives, for the Department of National Defence. Delivery will be at a location in Nova Scotia.
description: Encrypted external 8Tb SSD drives are required for the Department of National Defence. Delivery will be at a location in Nova Scotia. A bid must comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract. The Bidder must submit pricing in accordance with Annex A – List of Deliverables and Pricing.The supplier information will be stored in a database.
